text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActClass where concept is-a _ActClassRecordOrganizer

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActClass
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _ActClassRecordOrganizerrecord organizerUsed to group a set of acts sharing a common context. Organizer structures can nest within other context structures - such as where a document is contained within a folder, or a folder is contained within an EHR extract.
